text: Macaroni is a 1985 Italian comedy-drama movie directed by Ettore Scola and starring Jack Lemmon, Marcello Mastroianni, Daria Nicolodi, Isa Danieli, Marc Berman, Patrizia Sacchi, Bruno Esposito. ==Other websites== * Category:1985 comedy-drama movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Ettore Scola Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Naples
title: Macaroni (movie)
